title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
dimensions: H x W (in frame): 38 x 48 cm (14 15/16 x 18 7/8 in.)
description: Cotton ornamented with chinoiserie design in four scenes; a woman dancing, a woman musician, a man dancing, and man digging. Printed in red and two shades of brown.
